speedtree::BillboardOptimiser

speedtree::BillboardOptimiser Class Reference

#include <billboard_optimiser.hpp>

Detailed Description

The billboard optimiser.

Optimises billboard rendering by compiling all billboards placed in the same area (grouped by location) as a single vertex buffer, minimising the draw call overhead. The different textures of each tree type are all bunched together into a single texture atlas. Alpha test values, the only remaining unique feature that differentiates each tree billboard are uploaded as shader constants and processed in the vertex shader.
